SWORD.description: An ornamental sword found stabbed through the victim's heart.

PHOTOGRAPH 1.description: This is a photograph of the scene of the crime. The victim was found dead, stabbed with a sword.

LAWRENCE'S GLOVES.description: Lawrence's gloves stamped with his name, covered in blood.

LAWRENCE'S DOCUMENTS.description: Lawrence's documents outlining a plan to seize Garrett's company.

LAWRENCE WAS WITH GARRETT.description: Some notes you wrote about Lawrence being with Garrett.

ROY CALLS GARRETT BY FIRST NAME.description: Roy and Garrett don't have the best father-son relationship.
ROY CALLS GARRETT BY FIRST NAME.realities: core reality, affair reality, revenge reality

GARRETT LEFT THE PARTY.description: It seems that Garrett left the party early.

DENISE STAND DOWN.description: Denise seems to have calmed down after falsely accusing Melissa of the murder.

RUMORS ABOUT GARRETT.description: There seem to be rumors that depict Garrett as an evil individual.

DENISE ACCUSES MELISSA.description: Denise accused Melissa of involvement with the murder.

DENISE ACCUSES ALEXANDER.description: Denise accused Alexander of involvement with the murder.

LAWRENCE ACCUSES ROY.description: Lawrence accused Roy of involvement with the murder.

ROY ACCUSES LAWRENCE.description: Roy accused Lawrence of being alone with Garrett outside the party.

LAWRENCE ACCUSES NATHAN.description: Lawrence accused Nathan of involvement with the murder.

NATHAN ACCUSES KEVIN.description: Nathan accused Kevin of involvement with the murder.

ALEXANDER WAS LATE.description: Alexander claims to be early to the party.

ALEXANDER WAS EARLY.description: Alexander was in fact late to the party.

KEVIN JUMPED DOWN.description: Lawrence claims that Kevin jumped out of the office through a window.

KEVIN DID NOT JUMP DOWN.description: Multiple sources have confirmed that the window was in fact closed, and that Kevin did not jump out.

MELISSA DID NOT CHASE GARRETT.description: You don't know why you've been involved in this silly family drama.

MELISSA CHASED GARRETT.description: Denise claims that Melissa chased after Garrett.

GARRETT'S MARRIAGE.description: Denise and Garrett seemed to have a troubled marriage.

PHOTOGRAPH 2.description: This is a photograph of the scene of the crime. The victim was found dead with a poisoned glass.

GLASS.description: The glass that contained the poison that killed the victim.

FAKE GLASS.description: The poisoned glass that Melissa did not originally enter the party with.

REAL GLASS.description: The glass that Denise had poisoned and swapped with Garrett's.

DENISE'S WILL.description: Denise's will describing how she she and Garrett would go together.

SECURITY FOOTAGE.description: A recording from the mansion's security cameras.

REAL GLASS.description: The actual glass that Melissa was going to bring to Garrett.

WEDDING RING.description: A wedding ring that Garrett gave to Melissa.

RECEIPT.description: A recent receipt for a wedding ring, signed with Garrett's signature.

TRASH BAG.description: A mysterious trash bag thrown away earlier.

POISONED LETTER.description: A poisoned letter found on the victim, belonging to Denise.

DENISE'S LETTER.description: A letter found on the victim, belonging to Denise.

LETTER.description: A letter found on the victim.

PHOTOGRAPH 3.description: This is a photograph of the scene of the crime. The victim was found half-buried and strangled to death.

KEVIN'S JEALOUSY.description: It seems like Kevin was jealous of Garrett's marriage to Denise.

DENISE AND KEVIN.description: Denise and Kevin seem to be a bit too close.

FOUL PLAY.description: Someone sabotaged the power to the security cameras.

KEVIN'S GLOVES.description: A pair of gardener gloves, covered with small streaks of blood.

KEY.description: A key that Roy trusted to you.

KEVIN AND ROY.description: Kevin seems very interested in Roy for some reason.

ROY'S CONFESSION.description: Roy confessed that Kevin wants to replace Garrett as his father.
ROY'S CONFESSION.motive: to replace Garrett as Roy's father.

GARRETT LEFT WITH ALEXANDER.description: Garrett left the party with Alexander, but why?

GARRETT ALONE IN GARDENS.description: Alexander left Garrett alone in the gardens.

MISSING GARDEN HOSE.description: It seems like the garden hose is missing. That could be a possible murder weapon.

USB DRIVE.description: A USB drive containing Kevin's plan to strangle Garrett, to avenge his brother.

INVESTIGATION REPORT.description: A private investigation report on Lawrence Edgar and his connection to multiple workplace accidents

HIDDEN REPORT.description: Lawrence Edgar's report on workplace accidents, including the death of Kevin's brother.

KEVIN'S BROTHER.description: It seems like Kevin has a brother.

NEWSPAPER.description: A newspaper detailing an accident in Garrett's factory, involving the death of a �Billy Shepherd.'

GARRETT WAS NOT INSIDE.description: It seems like Garrett was murdered outside of the party.

CLOSED LOCKET.description: It seems like Kevin has a locket that's important to this case.

DIVORCE PAPERS.description: A pile of documents preparing Denise's divorce with Garrett.

ROSES.description: A bundle of roses that Kevin wanted to give to Denise.

SECRET MARRIAGE.description: It seems like Kevin and Denise were planning to marry in secret, without Garrett's approval.

GARDEN HOSE.description: The missing garden hose, found. It seems worn and damaged, it could've been used to strangle the victim.

OPEN LOCKET.description: Kevin's locket. It has a picture of him and his brother, with the words �Garrett killed Billy Shepherd' etched on the back.

MISSING SHOVEL.description: It seems like a shovel is missing, which would be involved with the victim being half-buried.

SHOVEL.description: The missing shovel, found. The fresh dirt, and a little bit of blood, means that this was used to kill and bury the victim.
